Backblaze.exception: SMS-capable phone required for initial setup.

Dropbox.exception: Hardware 2FA requires also enabling Software or SMS 2FA as a back-up.

Evernote.exception: SMS and phone call are always enabled as backup methods for TOTP.

OneDrive.exception: Hardware token supporting FIDO2/WebAuthn can only be used in Windows 10 version 1809 and above using Edge browser.

Tresorit.exception: Requires enabling at least two 2FA methods.

Yandex.Disk.exception: SMS-capable phone required for initial setup.

Commercial Bank of Qatar.exception: An SMS capable phone with a Qatar phone number is required.

Nordnet Sverige.exception: TFA only available for Swedish residents with BankID.

Aruba Cloud.exception: Only the control panel supports 2FA (the main client area does not).

Engine Yard.exception: To enable 2FA on Engine Yard, contact support.

Hostiso.exception: While both the main client area and the shared hosting panel support 2FA, each system is separate and requires its own setup.

Vultr.exception: Hardware 2FA only supports YubiKeys with Yubico OTP credentials.

Airship.exception: 2FA is only available upon request for customers on their Essential and Comprehensive plans.

Skype.exception: Must be associated with a Microsoft Account. U2F authentication only available on Edge browser.

Zoom.exception: 2FA is only available on paid plans and doesn't protect the desktop or mobile apps.

BitMEX.exception: At most one 2FA method can be enabled at any time.

BTC Markets.exception: A mobile phone number is required to reset two-factor authentication.

Coinify (Merchants).exception: 2FA is only available for merchant accounts. myCoinify trading accounts do not support 2FA.

GitHub.exception: Hardware tokens must have a backup method, either SMS or software token.

JetBrains.exception: U2F only available for Hub account (e.g. YouTrack). Limited to one software token OR one hardware token.

Domeneshop.exception: SMS available only to customers in Norway, Sweden and Denmark.

Dyn.exception: Currently only supported for the Managed DNS & Email Delivery platforms (via DynID). Eventually DynID (and 2FA) will be rolled out to all platforms (no ETA).

GoDaddy.exception: If hardware 2FA enabled, customer support by phone requires enabling back-up method.

Loopia.exception: TFA only available for Swedish residents with BankID.

united-domains.de.exception: A phone number is required to enable two-factor authentication.

California Institute of Technology (CalT.exception: SMS-capable phone required for initial setup.

Illinois Institute Of Technology.exception: Illinois Tech uses Google Apps for Eductation for their email; so they could very easily add tfa to their email, but at the time of this commit, they have it disabled and do not plan to implement it any time soon.

Outlook.com.exception: Hardware token supporting FIDO2/WebAuthn can only be used in Windows 10 version 1809 and above using Edge browser.

Tutanota.exception: Hardware 2FA not yet supported for their desktop & mobile apps.

Yandex.Mail.exception: SMS-capable phone required for initial setup.

Zimbra.exception: Available in Zimbra Collaboration 8.7 and above, Network Edition only

Zoho Mail.exception: YubiKey registration works only on the new version of Zoho Accounts. Only one (1) YubiKey may be registered at a time. Supported Devices: YubiKey NEO, YubiKey 4 Nano, YubiKey 4, YubiKey 4C, YubiKey 4C Nano, YubiKey NEO-n, YubiKey Edge, YubiKey Edge-n.

Twitch.exception: To activate two factor authentication, you must provide a mobile phone number.

BGL Corporate Solutions.exception: 2FA covers Simple Fund 360, CAS 360, BGL API and BGL Account. It doesn't cover BGL Client Centre.

Intuit TurboTax.exception: Software 2FA requires enabling SMS or phone call as a back-up.

PushCoin.exception: U2F support only for school admin accounts. 2FA for parent accounts is in progress.

Quickbooks Online.exception: TOTP 2FA only available after enabling SMS or phone 2FA.

Enjin.exception: 2FA is only available on paid plans.

Garena Online.exception: A mobile phone is required for 2FA.

Nintendo Account.exception: 2FA not available for child accounts (users 12 years of age or younger) or supervised accounts (users 13 years of age or older attached to a parent account).

Square Enix.exception: Software implementation requires you to have purchased either Final Fantasy XI or Final Fantasy XIV and registered the game.

AFIP.exception: 2FA is only available for users with security level (Clave Fiscal) 4

US Veteran Affairs.exception: 2FA is only available when using the Identity Management service ID.me

Oderland.exception: Only available for the main client area. Hosting panels not supported.

TransIP.exception: While both the main control panel and STACK support 2FA, each system is separate and requires its own setup.

UpCloud.exception: SMS is required for password recovery.

Booking.com.exception: Setup requires SMS verification. Email is available via 'other options' at login.

1Password.exception: Teams using Duo with 1Password can't enable additional 2FA as it's already handled by Duo. Hardware tokens (not U2F) are only available through Duo.

bitwarden.exception: Premium account required for Duo, YubiKey and FIDO U2F.

Dashlane.exception: FIDO U2F is a Premium feature only.

PassHub.exception: Hardware tokens only work on desktop.

SecureSafe.exception: 2FA is only available on paid plans.

Fidelity Investments.exception: Specific support varies between account types

Interactive Brokers.exception: SMS 2FA only works as long as no other method has been enabled.

Vanguard.exception: Hardware based 2FA requires SMS / Phone call 2FA as a backup. Hardware 2FA is only supported on Chrome browsers and works with the following hardware keys: Yubikey 4 Series, YubiKey 5 Series, Yubikey Security Key Series.

Arlo.exception: Email 2FA is always available as a backup.

Wyze.exception: 2FA via SMS is only available for USA and Canada.

HelloSign.exception: SMS Two-factor authentication is only available to paid Business plan senders and above.

Ancestry.exception: 2FA is currently only available for customers with a U.S. based phone number.

GoFundMe.exception: 2FA only for North American customers that create Personal campaigns.

ImmobilienScout24.exception: SMS is only available to commercial real estate providers.

Immowelt.exception: 2FA is only available for commercial partners.

Office 365.exception: Hardware token supporting FIDO2/WebAuthn can only be used in Windows 10 version 1809 and above using Edge browser.

Repairshopr.exception: SMS only available as a backup to Google Authenticator.

WageWorks.exception: Employer/plan sponsor may opt to not offer 2FA.

Watchman Monitoring.exception: Two factor authentication unavailable for 'End User' access, which is read-only.

Wikipedia.exception: Currently limited to administrators (and users with admin-like permissions like interface editors), bureaucrats, checkusers, oversighters, stewards, edit filter managers and the OATH-testers global group.

Amazon Pay.exception: SMS or phone call required to enable 2FA. Enabling on Amazon.com activates 2FA on other regional Amazon sites, such as UK and DE.

Klarna.exception: Software 2FA is only available for Swedish citizens with BankID.

PAYEER.exception: Receiving codes via SMS cost 0.05$ each message. 2FA is personalizable in account settings.

PayPal.exception: 2FA is only available in a few countries. Contact PayPal on Twitter for an up-to-date list of available countries.

Skrill.exception: Email method requires an additional PIN

Square.exception: SMS only supported in US and Canada

Western Union.exception: 2FA is only available for business accounts.

join.me (w/ LogMeIn account).exception: SMS or email must be set up as a backup method

LogMeIn.exception: SMS or email must be set up as a backup method

Remote Desktop Manager.exception: 2FA is only available on the Enterprise Edition

Amazon.exception: SMS or phone call required to enable 2FA. Enabling on Amazon.com activates 2FA on other regional Amazon sites, such as UK and DE.

HackerOne.exception: SMS-capable phone required for initial setup.

Pwnie Express Pwn Pulse.exception: TFA can be enabled on Pwn Pulse Accounts upon customer request.

Facebook.exception: Hardware 2FA requires also enabling a back-up method and is unsupported on mobile.

HootSuite.exception: Email is always enabled as backup method for Software Token.

LinkedIn.exception: Only one 2FA method is allowed at a time.

Medium.exception: Medium doesn't use passwords, instead emails a link to user to login

Twitter.exception: Mobile apps do not support Hardware 2FA. Hardware 2FA requires enabling back-up method. Cannot add multiple security keys. SMS only available on select providers.

Airtable.exception: SMS must be enabled first and software 2FA can be bypassed by SMS.

Andrews &amp; Arnold.exception: While both the accounts and control web pages support 2FA, each system is separate and requires its own setup.

Comcast.exception: Email 2FA requires the use of a non-Comcast.net email address.

Con Edison.exception: Requires phone number to set up. Can be bypassed by customer support.

Halebop.exception: 2FA is only available for Swedish citizens with BankID.

Telia (Sweden).exception: 2FA is only available for Swedish citizens with BankID.
